span.font: Registration follows almost the same flow as signin

div.p: More data is supplied and the user record is created in the DB. The Firebase UserID becomes the Database ID and Firebase data may be used to pre-populate fields (e.g. email, avatar url, etc.

switch.text: Registration follows almost the same flow...

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
